
```
cargo run release 10000000 # write 10 million data items

# results look like this:

NONE
data 10000000
98.835872ms
1383600000

MUTEX
data 10000000
831.190241ms
1290000000

SEQCST
data 10000000
273.738834ms
1246500000

RELAXED
data 10000000
296.055143ms
1400100000

MUTEX WRITE+READ
data 10000000
24.324892919s
1199300000

SEQCST WRITE+READ
data 10000000
4.482669336s
1345400000

FENCED WRITE+READ

```
